languages.text: "Для отвернувшихся от цар{mf|я|ицы} ковчега, кто променял тернистый путь служения на сладость лживых обещаний, нет дороги обратно... Обычно. Но я запомню твои слова, Домин".

"There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."
languages.original_text: "Для отвернувшихся от цар{mf|я|ицы} ковчега, кто променял тернистый путь служения на сладость лживых обещаний, нет дороги обратно... Обычно. Но я запомню твои слова, Домин".

traits.locale_text: "There is no turning back for those who have turned away from the {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark, those who have traded the arduous path of service for the cloying taste of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Enim."

"There is no turning back for those who have turned away from the {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark, those who have traded the arduous path of service for the cloying taste of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Enim."

"There is no turning back for those who have abandoned the {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the cloying smell of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Enim."

"There is no turning back for those who have abandoned the {mf|King|Queen} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the cloying smell of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Enim."

"There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."

"There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."

languages.text: "Es gibt kein Zurück für jene, die sich {mf|dem Lord|der Lady} der Arche widersetzt und den mühsamen Weg des Dienstes gegen die Süße falscher Versprechungen eingetauscht haben ... Jedenfalls ist das nicht üblich. Aber ich werde mich an Eure Worte erinnern, Domin."
languages.original_text: "There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."

traits.locale_text: "Es gibt kein Zurück für jene, die sich {mf|dem Lord|der Lady} der Arche widersetzt und den mühsamen Weg des Dienstes gegen die Süße falscher Versprechungen eingetauscht haben ... Jedenfalls ist das nicht üblich. Aber ich werde mich an Eure Worte erinnern, Domin."

languages.text: «No hay vuelta atrás para quienes desafían a{mf|l señor| la señora} del Arca, pues han abandonado la ardua senda del servicio por la dulzura de las promesas falsas... normalmente, al menos. Pero recordaré sus palabras, Domin».
languages.original_text: "There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."

traits.locale_text: «No hay vuelta atrás para quienes desafían a{mf|l señor| la señora} del Arca, pues han abandonado la ardua senda del servicio por la dulzura de las promesas falsas... normalmente, al menos. Pero recordaré sus palabras, Domin».

languages.text: 「箱舟の{mf|君|方}に逆らった者、仕えるという苦難の道を偽りの甘い約束と交換した者は、もはや後戻りはできない…少なくとも、普通はね。だけどあなたの言葉は覚えておくわ、ドミン」
languages.original_text: "There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."

traits.locale_text: 「箱舟の{mf|君|方}に逆らった者、仕えるという苦難の道を偽りの甘い約束と交換した者は、もはや後戻りはできない…少なくとも、普通はね。だけどあなたの言葉は覚えておくわ、エニム」

languages.text: “对那些忤逆方舟之主的人而言，他们已经没有回头路了。他们摒弃了艰苦的侍奉之路，以此换取甜美的虚假承诺……至少大部分人都是这样。但即便如此，我还是会将你的话铭记于心，秘者。”
languages.original_text: "There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."

traits.locale_text: “对那些忤逆方舟之主的人而言，他们已经没有回头路了。他们摒弃了艰苦的侍奉之路，以此换取甜美的虚假承诺……至少大部分人都是这样。但即便如此，我还是会将你的话铭记于心，秘者。”

languages.text: « Nul retour en arrière n'est possible pour ceux qui ont défié {mf|le seigneur|la dame} de l'Arche, qui ont renoncé à servir pour se laisser convaincre par des promesses fallacieuses... Du moins, cela est rare. Mais je me souviendrai de vos paroles, Domin. »
languages.original_text: "There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."

traits.locale_text: « Nul retour en arrière n'est possible pour ceux qui ont défié {mf|le seigneur|la dame} de l'Arche, qui ont renoncé à servir pour se laisser convaincre par des promesses fallacieuses... Du moins, cela est rare. Mais je me souviendrai de vos paroles, Domin. »

languages.text: "Ark'ın {mf|Lordu'na|Leydisi'ne} başkaldıranlar ve kulağa güzel gelen sahte sözler uğruna hizmetin meşakkatli yolunu feda edenler için... Genellikle geri dönüş yoktur. Fakat sözlerini aklıma kazıyacağım Domin."
languages.original_text: "There is no turning back for those who have defied the {mf|Lord|Lady} of the Ark, who have traded the arduous path of service for the sweetness of false promises... At least, not commonly. But I will remember your words, Domin."
